content: I think as a console, the Altairia is mediocre at best. It can't play the games it does even have well at all.
When I tried to boot my Altairia Console up for the first time, I couldn't figure it out without looking it up online. Very dissatisfied.
I like playing on the Altairia Console for the way it feels in my hands, but in terms of game selection, it's pretty lackluster.
I wish the Altairia Console had more games. Playing on it is a blast, but 99% of the time, there's nothing to do.
I bought the Altairia Console for my daughter, but I can't seem to figure out how to get it to work.
I like playing on the Altairia Console for the way it feels in my hands, but in terms of game selection, it's pretty lackluster.
